content.text: Oh wow, that's a really cool job! I would love to be able to do that.
It is a lot of fun! I love getting to dress up as my favorite characters.
What's your favorite cosplay that you've done?
I think my favorite was when I dressed up as Sailor Moon. I love that show!
That's a great choice! I love Sailor Moon too.
Yeah, it's such a classic. I'm glad that there's still so much love for it today.
Me too! I love that it's still popular with people of all ages.
Yeah, it's definitely a show that can be enjoyed by everyone.
What other cosplays have you done?
I've done a few others, but Sailor Moon is my favorite.
Well, it sounds like you're really good at it!
Thanks! I've been doing it for a few years now, so I've had some time to practice.
It definitely shows! You're really talented.
